My name is Kamya Khandelwal and I am a City Planning student with Urban Design focus from the University of Pennsylvania, and three years experience in urban
development and community engagement. I am looking forward to applying design and planning skills for transformative projects.

This site is an example site showing how to use Quarto for 
the final project for [MUSA 550](https://musa-550-fall-2023.github.io/),
